description:
Adds the "Safety" difficulty option, suggested for beginners or those who want to enjoy the story. This difficulty is recommended for those who have little experience with RPGs.

*Difficulty can be selected when starting a new game or changed in the Options menu in the main game.
*Exclusive content for the game Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance. Please be aware that it cannot be used for Shin Megami Tensei V.
name: Safety Difficulty
